Name: Rubi Navarros
Description:
Rubi was drinking in a bar with someone she had a relationship with when he pulled out a gun and started shooting at people. Rubi and a cisgender woman named Vera Lucia were killed. The killer fled the scene.

A man suspected of being their killer was arrested in Araguaia in March 2018.

According to the Civil Police of MT, Danilo de Sousa Araújo, 25, killed a military police officer in Maranhão, besides being suspected of participating in the death of a [cis] woman and a trans woman in a bar in Luziânia, Federal District.

Her Facebook profile is https://www.facebook.com/rubi.navarros.

Name: Sandra Marafigo Cordeiro
Description:
Sandra was found dead on the morning of Wednesday 8th March in Cristo Rei Square, Laranjeiras do Sul, in the south of Paraná. According to reports she had arrived in the city during the previous week and had been sleeping rough in the square.

On the Saturday before her murder she had been beaten by some young people near the bus station, and gone to the police station to report the assault. Her death was a result of the head injury she suffered during the assault.

Name: Jennifer Celia Henrique (Jenni)
Description:
Jenni was found dead with head injuries in a building in the neighbourhood of Ingleses, in the north of Santa Catarina Island. A suspect was arrested just over a month later on 23rd April 2017 and confessed to her murder.

She had previously been assaulted in 2013 and 2016.

> The murder caused commotion in social networks, especially in the LGBT community of Santa Catarina.
> 
> Jenni, who worked with the sale of cosmetics, is described by friends as a “cheerful” person, “smiling” and “always saw the good side of life.”
> 
> Another friend wrote that today was a day of “cowardice … of prejudice … of injustice … What to talk about you ??? They are good things … joy … strength … friendship … courage. Not always what suits us serves the other … as well as what is good for another sometimes does not suit us … being different is not bad … life is made of differences … let’s know how to live .. .amar … to respect.”

Her Facebook profile is https://www.facebook.com/jennifercelia.henrique.

https://homofobiamata.wordpress.com/2017/03/10/jennifer-celia-henrique-representante-de-vendas-38-anos-pauladas-8adp-sc-florianopolis/

Name: Name Unknown
Description:
The victim’s body was found stuffed into an abandoned suitcase which was found dumped on wasteland.

> TLAJOMULCO DE ZUÑIGA, JAL.- An individual who apparently was a transvestite was deprived of herlife and put inside a suitcase, which was later dumped in a property in this municipality.
>
> The discovery was made on Saturday, March 11, minutes before four in the afternoon, and so far the victim has not been identified, although it was possible to know that he was between 35 and 40 years old.
>
> The Municipal Police received a report of an abandoned suitcase from which blood had leaked in a property on boulevard Santa Fe and avenida Concepción, in barrio Santa Fe. Several officers went to the scene to investigate.
>
> Upon arrival, they confirmed that there was a blue suitcase lying among garbage. When they opened it they discovered the naked body of a [woman], who apparently was a [trans woman], who's body had traces of violence.

TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & Quadratin 11.03.2017

https://noticieroelcirco.com/travesti-fue-ejecutado-y-enmaletado-en-tlajomulco-de-zuniga-jalisco/

https://www.facebook.com/noticieroelcirco/posts/1305722489494859

Name: Gabriele Marchiori ("Gabii")
Description:
Gabriele’s body was found burned. The exact cause of her death is unknown, but it is suspected that she may have been murdered elsewhere.

> A body was found burning in a wasteland on Frederico Augusto Ritter Avenue, in Cachoeirinha Industrial District.on the morning of last Sunday (12).
>
> According to the Military Brigade, a 47-year-old man was passing by when he saw the fire and quickly put it out. But the victim was already dead. He then called the emergency services.
>
> At the time of the incident, the victim was not identified, but it was noted that they were wearing women's clothing and makeup. On social networks, friends identified her as an 18-year-old [trans woman] who lives in the Morada do Vale neighborhood in Gravataí.

Gabriele’s Facebook profile is https://www.facebook.com/gabemarchiori.

Name: Danilo Melhorini
Description:
Danilo died by suicide. Their Facebook profile is https://www.facebook.com/melhorini.

> Today in the sky, a shining star has been made. The most glamorous and full of sparkle woman who illuminated the way of all with great joy, good mood, with all glitter that came from her beautiful spirituality.
> 
> This passage makes me think so much how much we only know what’s going on inside of you, your fears, your monsters and anguish. She chose to leave for another plan, and she will arrive debuting in heaven, as a diva that was and will always be in our memories.
> 
> Go in peace honey!

Name: Angie Velásquez Ramírez
Description:
Angie was detained during a police operation on 18th February 2017. She was held for about twenty days in the police station No. 11 of Ringuelet “in intolerable conditions”, then taken to Florencio Varela and Lisando Olmos prisons. She died in custody less than a month later.

Her death was the second of four in custody deaths in similar suspicious circumstances (the others being Pamela Macedo Panduro, Brandy Bardales Sangama and Damaris Becerra Jurado) in the same province during 2017.

All were Peruvian migrants and Otrans activists. Otrans reports that in the city the police routinely make arbitrary arrests of trans women. The detainees are routinely held without charge for long periods in degrading conditions without access to healthcare.

The trans support organisation Otrans Argentina (http://otransargentina.org/) denounced her death as a hate crime and filed a criminal complaint accusing the judge and prosecutor in charge of her case of killing her.

Like the similar deaths in 2017, Angie's death was not recorded on the official TGEU TDoR 2017 memorial list.

http://cosecharoja.org/otra-vez-muere-una-muere-una-trans-en-prision/

Name: Bruninha Tavares
Description:
Bruninha was stabbed. A farm worker found her body in a rural area in Salta Grande. She had stab wounds to the back and neck and her body showed signs of being mauled by a jaguar.

Friends of Bruninha who where with her before she was murdered reported that they had been ambushed by another car containing three people who the stabbed Bruninha in the back and forced her into their car. Afterwards they left at high speed heading towards the highway. 

Three suspects were subsequently arrested.

Name: H. Ramirez Calderon
Description:
H. was shot 6 times in the street at 6:15am on Sunday 19th March. Neighbours reported hearing gunshots, and upon investigration they found a trans woman lying near the corner of 5 de Febrero street.

Seeing that there was a lot of blood, they asked for the support of the emergency corps, but nothing could be done, because the person had already died in the place.

https://periodicocorreo.com.mx/405370-2/

Name: Paola Ponce
Description:
Paola was tortured, raped and beaten to death. Her killer then threw her body into the street a short distance from her home.

> According to her brother, the woman was engaged in sex work and every day she placed herself on Avenida Marte R. Gómez, at the intersection with Mar Caribe Street, in the Valle de Aragón neighborhood to wait for her clients.
> 
> A partner of Paola says that the last time he saw her was boarding a green Jeep Cherokee car, model of 2010, which was driven by a man. That was at 9 o’clock at night. Twelve hours later the neighbors found his body in a vacant lot, apparently the woman was dragged to that place.

http://desastre.mx/mexico/paola-fue-violada-y-asesinada-por-ser-trans-en-tamaulipas/

http://www.hoytamaulipas.net/notas/287437/Identifican-a-hombre-vestido-de-mujer-asesinado-en-Matamoros.html

Name: Alphonza Watson
Description:
Alphonza was shot in the stomach after an argument with two men at about 4:15 am. She was taken to Johns Hopkins Hospital but was pronounced dead shortly after arrival.

According to witnesses, someone was heard shouting for help and two men were seen running away and getting into a car.

https://mic.com/articles/171840/alphonza-watson-38-year-old-transgender-woman-killed-in-baltimore

http://www.pinknews.co.uk/2017/03/22/eighth-trans-woman-shot-and-killed-in-the-us-this-year/

Name: Paola Bracho
Description:
Paola was beaten and stabbed at least 17 times by a group of sex workers, apparently following a dispute over work. The perpetrators fled in a vehicle.

> A [trans woman] who used the name Paola, registered as [deadname], 40, was beaten and stabbed at least 17 times at around 1:30 am today, in Dourados. The crime involved eight other [trans women] and the motive was a dispute over prostitution.
>
> According to the police report, witnesses were in the company of the victim, at the intersection between Avenida Joaquim Teixeira Alves and Rua João Cândido Câmara, in Dourados at a time when the [trans women] identified as Rahine and Kimberly arrived saying that they wanted to talk to Paola.
>
> Accompanied by six other[trans women], and as soon as the victim turned away from the witnesses for the supposed conversation, each armed with knives and even iron bars, they started to attack her. Paola was killed with at least 17 stab wounds, 14 of them in the back and three in the neck, police said. In addition, the victim had head trauma.
>
> According to statements made to the police, at the time when Paola was attacked, the witnesses ran and hid. From a distance they observed that the group had fled in a car and then they then called for first responders. Despite their efforts Paola died at the crime scene.

Five of the six tried for her murder were convicted in February 2018.

http://www.topmidianews.com.br/policia/cinco-travestis-sao-condenadas-por-morte-de-paolla-bracho/84528/

https://homofobiamata.wordpress.com/2017/03/22/paola-bracho-prof-sexo-40-anos-facadas-ms-dourados/

Name: Wilka
Description:
Wilka was on her way back from a friend’s house to her home in Loteamento Luiz Gonzaga when she was attacked and stabbed in the abdomen, neck and back. A friend reported that she was murdered after a robber realised that she was transgender.

> “Wherever you are, good rest” 
> “Now you are free from the murderers of the earth.”

Note that the TGEU list gives her name as “Uilca”, but her friends called her Wilka so that is the name given here.

**Please also not that the photos shown in the some of the links below are extremely distressing. Please do not click on them unless you are sure you can handle what you will see. **
